description: The Tees Valley Net Zero Industry Scholarship helps train people for the green sector.
title: Teesside green sector scholarship creates 'quite a buzz'
title_page: Teesside green sector scholarship creates 'quite a buzz' - BBC News
maintext:
A college has seen more than 100 expressions of interest within a week of the launch of a scholarship to help people find jobs in the green energy sector.
The Tees Valley Net Zero Industry Scholarship opened at the start of the week and offers paid-training for up to two years.
The Â£1m programme is delivered by Redcar and Cleveland, Middlesbrough, Hartlepool and Darlington Colleges, and Neta Training of Stockton.
Zoe Lewis, principal of Middlesbrough College Group, said the scholarship had "created quite a buzz".
